inventory.commentary: 14Feb08 added 3 senses, features and examples. ahouston

sense.name: physical items used in some context and purpose
sense.commentary: EQUIPMENT[+entity][+artifact][+item][+useful][+in_context] an instrumentality needed for an undertaking or to perform a service
sense.examples: John spent $2000 on new office equipment. This store sells all kinds of sports equipment. A lot of heavy equipment was parked at the construction site. A good cook needs the right equipment in the kitchen.

sense.name: the act or process of supplying necessary items or tools
sense.commentary: EQUIPMENT[+event][+supplying][+artifacts][+required][+for_purpose] Note: X's equipment of Y -> X equipped Y (nominalization)
sense.examples: The construction and equipment of a new marina will take some time. His equipment of the boat for a long passage including stocking provisions, checking electronics and mending sails. Mary's equipment of her new kitchen took months of decisions and thousands of dollars.

sense.name: inherent mental faculty, ability
sense.examples: These students lack the intellectual equipment to learn such advanced types of mathematics. She has the equipment to perform all the multitasking required to run an emergency ward.

sense.name: male genitalia, slang
sense.examples: The pornography magazines show men with exceptional equipment. The ad claims this drug will enlarge your equipment considerably.
